note: FLUX.1 Kontext does not understand 'image 1' or 'image 2' references. Prompts must describe what to combine without explicit image references.

style_transfer.name: Style Transfer

style_description.label: Style to Apply
style_description.placeholder: e.g., Van Gogh's swirling brushstrokes and vibrant colors

content_description.label: Content to Preserve
content_description.placeholder: e.g., the cityscape composition and architecture

defaults.preservation: preserving the original structure and composition

examples: Transform into impressionist painting style while maintaining the modern architecture
Apply watercolor aesthetics while preserving the portrait's features
Convert to anime art style while keeping the original pose and expression

scene_merge.name: Scene Merging

element1.label: Primary Element
element1.placeholder: e.g., the person in business attire

defaults.integration: creating natural lighting and shadow consistency

examples: Combine the standing figure with the mountain landscape
Merge the red car with the city street scene
Integrate the cat with the cozy living room setting

attribute_blend.name: Attribute Blending
attribute_blend.description: Mix specific attributes from different sources

attribute1.label: First Set of Attributes
attribute1.placeholder: e.g., the vibrant color palette and lighting

attribute2.label: Second Set of Attributes
attribute2.placeholder: e.g., the geometric composition and sharp lines

examples: Create a composition with warm sunset colors and modern architectural forms
Mix vintage photography aesthetics and contemporary fashion styling
Blend natural textures and digital art elements

transformation.name: State Transformation
transformation.description: Transform between different states or conditions
examples: Transform the city from day to night
Change the forest from autumn to spring
Convert the room from messy to organized

fusion.name: Creative Fusion

defaults.style: in a cohesive and believable manner

examples: Fuse architectural elements with natural landscapes to create fantasy structures
Combine vintage and futuristic design elements to create steampunk aesthetics
Merge realistic and cartoon styles to create unique character designs

character_merge.name: Character Merging
character_merge.description: Combine multiple characters in one scene
character_merge.template: Place both {character1} and {character2} together in one scene where they are {arrangement}, {interaction}
interaction_presets: one in foreground, one in background
examples: Place both warrior character and mage character together in one scene where they are in battle stance, creating dynamic composition
Place both bride character and groom character together in one scene where they are standing at altar, with romantic lighting
Place both superhero and villain together in one scene where they are in confrontation pose, maintaining dramatic tension

best_practices: Describe visual elements rather than referencing image numbers
Be specific about what attributes to combine
Use descriptive language for styles and elements
Focus on the desired outcome rather than the source
